about.title: ABOUT ME
about.intro: I am a Computer Science student specializing in web development. Passionate about programming, AI integration, and building innovative web applications!
about.quote: “Great apps don’t just look good — they load fast, work everywhere, and feel intuitive.”
about.description: I’m a Frontend Developer focused on building fast, accessible, and maintainable web applications using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. From the very beginning of my coding journey, I’ve been fascinated by how code directly shapes user experiences. Over time, I’ve learned that great applications are not only about technology — performance, accessibility, usability, and testing are equally important to ensure reliability and long-term quality. I enjoy turning ideas into products, combining clean interfaces with solid backend logic, always keeping the end user in mind. My long-term goal is to grow into a Full-Stack Engineer, so I can deliver features from concept to deployment and contribute to large-scale applications. Outside of coding, I’m passionate about model building — a hobby that teaches me attention to detail and reminds me of the joy of creating.

whoIam.title: WHO I AM
whoIam.description: I’m a Frontend Developer specializing in React and Next.js. I build fast, modern, and user-friendly web applications with a focus on performance and clean code. I’m passionate about turning ideas into products by combining clean UI with solid backend logic. Currently, I’m growing my expertise in full-stack development while keeping accessibility and user experience at the center of my work.

skills.title: SKILLS & TECHNOLOGIES
skills.intro: Technologies and tools I use to build efficient, scalable, and innovative solutions!

experience.title: EXPERIENCE
experience.intro: Companies and projects where I contributed my skills

devs.description: Contributed to hands-on commercial projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js. Focused on building modern, responsive interfaces with robust test coverage. Collaborated closely with a Senior Frontend Developer and participated in Agile ceremonies including code reviews and sprint planning.
highlights: Built and optimized scalable web applications used by over 1,000 users
Improved performance of key components, reducing load time by 30%
Developed features in a modern frontend stack with 85% test coverage using RTL
Actively participated in daily stand-ups and pair programming sessions

alan.description: Developed and maintained automated end-to-end tests using CodeceptJS and JavaScript. Conducted functional and regression testing of web applications. Worked in a SCRUM team to ensure product quality and timely delivery. Reported bugs and collaborated with developers to ensure fast resolution.
highlights: Automated over 100 regression test cases using CodeceptJS
Reduced manual testing time by 60% through test automation
Tested core production features including login and payment flows

education.title: EDUCATION
education.intro: My academic journey, courses, and educational achievements that have shaped my technical expertise.

opole.description: Currently pursuing a Computer Science degree at Opole University of Technology. The curriculum covers algorithms, data structures, object-oriented programming, databases, operating systems, and computer networks, with a strong focus on software engineering and low-level programming.
highlights: Engineering studies in Computer Science
Focus on algorithms, data structures, and low-level programming

wsiz.school: University of Information Technology and Management, Rzeszów
wsiz.description: One-year engineering program in Computer Science, covering the fundamentals of programming: algorithms, data structures, OOP, databases, operating systems, and computer networks.
highlights: One-year Computer Science engineering program
Covered fundamentals of algorithms, OOP, databases, and operating systems

webamigosFullstack.title: Web Amigos - Modern and Efficient Web Applications (MEWA)
webamigosFullstack.description: An advanced programming course covering eight thematic tracks: TypeScript, NX.dev, React, Next.js, NestJS, AI-powered automations, and deployment with Docker and Kubernetes. The program emphasizes best practices, clean code architecture, and the complete process of building modern web applications – from frontend to backend to deployment.
highlights: Advanced technologies: React, Next.js, NestJS, NX.dev
Deployment with Docker and Kubernetes
AI-powered automations and integrations

webamigosReact.title: Web Amigos - School of React
webamigosReact.description: An intensive course focused on React and modern frontend practices. Topics included React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Redux Toolkit, React Hook Form, API communication, and component testing. The program also emphasized application optimization and best practices in frontend development.
highlights: Hands-on practice with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
State management with Redux Toolkit and forms with React Hook Form
Component testing and performance optimization
Completed course confirmed with certificate

megak.title: MEGAK - Full-Stack Development Journey
megak.description: A one-year full-stack bootcamp covering JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, Express, NestJS, and MongoDB. The program included building complete web applications with REST APIs, CRUD operations, authentication, design patterns, and testing fundamentals.
highlights: Full-stack learning: frontend, backend, and databases
Implementation of REST APIs, CRUD operations, and authentication
Introduction to design patterns and testing

sda.title: Software Development Academy - Software Tester
sda.description: Comprehensive introduction to software testing, covering manual and automated testing, REST API testing, SQL, and Agile methodologies, with preparation for the ISTQB Foundation exam.
highlights: Manual and automated testing
REST API testing and SQL
Agile methodologies and ISTQB exam preparation
Completed course confirmed with certificate

featuredProjects.title: FEATURED PROJECTS
featuredProjects.intro: A selection of my recent web development and programming projects.

movieDashboard.title: Movie Stream Dashboard
movieDashboard.shortDescription: A personalized movie management and discovery dashboard with analytics and advanced filtering.
movieDashboard.description: A modern platform for managing and discovering movies with a focus on personalization and user engagement. It includes a tailored recommendation system powered by dynamic filtering and user history analysis. Advanced search capabilities allow users to find titles by genre, rating, or release date in seconds. Users can comment on movies, add or remove them from favorites, and manage their profiles through a personal dashboard. Built with Next.js for performance and Firebase for authentication and database storage, it delivers a secure and responsive experience. The UI is designed with Material UI and Styled-Components for a sleek, consistent look.
keyFeatures: Secure user authentication and registration system
Advanced search and filtering system
Personalized movie recommendations
Add/remove movies from favorites
User comment system on movies
User profile management
Firebase-based authentication and database
Optimized performance with Next.js

weatherApp.title: Weather App
weatherApp.shortDescription: An interactive weather app with real-time forecasts, charts, and dark mode.
weatherApp.description: An interactive weather application delivering real-time data and extended forecasts for cities worldwide. It provides detailed hourly and daily predictions, along with visually rich charts using Chart.js. Users can search for locations, view historical trends, and toggle between light and dark themes for better accessibility. Built with React and TypeScript, it features optimized API calls through caching to ensure fast performance. The application is fully tested with Jest, Playwright, and RTL to guarantee reliability across devices. Its responsive design ensures a seamless experience on both mobile and desktop.
keyFeatures: Search for weather information by city name
View current weather including temperature, humidity, wind speed, etc.
Hourly weather forecast for selected location
3-day temperature graph using Chart.js
Map view of selected location
Detect current location for weather display
Add cities to favorites (stored in LocalStorage)
Comprehensive testing with Jest and RTL
End-to-end testing with Playwright

urlShortener.title: URL Shortener
urlShortener.shortDescription: A fast and secure tool for shortening links with real-time analytics.
urlShortener.description: A fast and secure URL shortener designed to transform long, unwieldy links into compact, shareable URLs. The application includes analytics tools to track clicks, user locations, and referrers in real-time. Users can customize their shortened links, set expiration dates, and manage them via an intuitive interface. Built with Vite, it ensures minimal load times and smooth navigation. Cypress testing ensures stability and a bug-free user experience. Its minimalistic design focuses on functionality while remaining visually appealing.
keyFeatures: Responsive layout for multiple screen sizes
Shorten any valid URL to a unique 8-character path
Store shortened URLs in local storage
Delete shortened links from storage
Copy shortened links to clipboard in one click
Validation with error messages for empty or invalid input

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.shortDescription: A modern personal portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and experience.
portfolio.description: A personal portfolio built with Next.js and React, designed to be fast, responsive, and easy to navigate. The website highlights projects, professional experience, and technical skills in a visually appealing and structured way. It includes a contact form powered by Resend for direct communication and leverages Aceternity UI for modern, elegant components. The project emphasizes performance, clarity, and aesthetics to stand out both technically and visually
keyFeatures: Modern, responsive design optimized for all devices
Projects section with previews and links to GitHub/live demos
Contact form with email handling via Resend
Integration with Aceternity UI for sleek, reusable components
Fast performance with Next.js and optimized images
Easy to maintain and expand for future updates

allProjects.title: ALL PROJECTS
allProjects.intro: Explore a collection of my recent work across various technologies and domains.

services.title: SERVICES
services.intro: I offer a range of services to help you build and maintain your web applications!

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Building robust and scalable websites and applications.
webDevelopment.details: I specialize in building modern web applications that are fast, secure, and scalable. Using frameworks like Next.js and React, I create solutions tailored to your business needs, ensuring optimal performance and smooth user experience.

responsiveDesign.title: Responsive Design
responsiveDesign.description: Ensuring your website looks great on all devices.
responsiveDesign.details: I design and build interfaces that adapt perfectly to any screen size, providing an excellent experience on mobile, tablet, and desktop. My approach ensures usability and accessibility are top priorities.

seoOptimization.title: SEO Optimization
seoOptimization.description: Improving your website visibility in search engines.
seoOptimization.details: I improve the visibility of your website by following modern SEO practices. From technical SEO and structured data to performance and keyword optimization, I ensure your site is well-prepared to rank higher.

performanceOptimization.title: Performance Optimization
performanceOptimization.description: Improving load times, performance scores, and user experience.
performanceOptimization.details: I help optimize your website’s performance by reducing bundle sizes, lazy-loading assets, and improving Core Web Vitals. Faster websites don’t just convert better — they rank better too.

apiIntegration.title: API Integration
apiIntegration.description: Seamless integration with external APIs and services.
apiIntegration.details: I integrate your app with REST or GraphQL APIs, authentication providers, payment systems, CMSs, and any other third-party services you rely on. Clean, reusable code and error handling guaranteed.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Auditing and fixing accessibility issues so your app works for everyone.
accessibility.details: I perform WCAG 2.2 AA audits and implement fixes: semantic HTML, proper ARIA, keyboard navigation, focus management, and color-contrast checks. You get a prioritized report, code changes, and a short guide for your team.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.intro: Have a project in mind? Let’s connect and build something great together!
contact.subtitle: Do You Have A Project? Let’s Talk.

collaboration.title: LET'S COLLABORATE
collaboration.description: Interested in working together? Whether you have a project idea, need help with web development, or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out. I’m always open to discussing new opportunities and collaborations.
